text:
Hi! We at Backbase in Amsterdam are looking for new and talented colleagues to join us here. So no remote jobs, only onsite. We are looking for a range of people. Our FE stack: Javascript, CSS, HTML, Bootstrap and Angular. BE: Java, Spring, Hibernate, Apache Camel.

We at Backbase help financial institutions to digitalise, with our omni-channel product. Some cool stuff!

Check out our openings at: careers.backbase.com or send me (Adriaan) an email on adriaan@backbase.com.

Location: Amsterdam Postition: Frontend, Backend.
